name: Ghost Mansion
description:
Ghost Mansion is a procedural rogue-like game with magic and evil creatures.

You are a wizard who has to find 4 magic books and destroy them going back to the magic circle of the same color of the book.

You can use your spells and buy items in the shop to complete the level.

If you need more help, check the Help section of the main menu or pause menu.

Key Controls:

  • ASDW: Moving the player
  • Arrows: Cast spell in each direction
  • Space: Place Bomb
  • Q, E: select previous or next spell
  • 1,2,3,4: select spell

Mouse Controls:

  • Left Click: Cast Spell
  • Right Click: Place Bomb
  • Scroll Wheel: Select spell

Xbox Controls:

  • Left Stick: moving player
  • Left Stick: Place Bomb
  • A, B, X, Y: Cast spell in each direction
  • RB / LB: select spell

This game was made using Unity and Super Tilemap Editor to create and edit the procedural dungeons.
